title: Bitwarden vs LastPass: Which should you choose in 2023?
description: We've compared the two password managers on metrics such as features, security, pricing, and more.

title: Don’t type this very normal link into WhatsApp on Android, it will crash loop
description: What's worse is that the crash loop doesn't stop until you delete the message.

title: Pixel Watch 2 could ditch Exynos for Snapdragon and gain more battery life
description: The leak suggests that the next gen smartwatch can last over a day with AOD enabled.

title: Amazon is ending support for Alexa’s celebrity voices soon
description: Shaq and Melissa McCarthy's voices will no longer be supported later this year.

title: OnePlus tells customer to wait 6-7 months before redeeming YouTube Premium trial
description: The issue may take the rest of the year to fix.

title: Apple just launched an Android app before similar iPad or Mac apps
description: If you own an iPad or a Mac, your Android-using friends will have this app before you.

title: First chance ever to save over $100 on the latest iPad Mini
description: The 256GB model of the iPad Mini 6 is down to $540 in this Amazon deal.

title: Verizon’s new plans don’t make much sense for families
description: MyPlan? Feels more like MyCashGrab if you have multiple lines.

title: Motorola launches the Moto G Stylus 5G (2023) with a new camera setup
description: The Moto G Stylus 5G (2023) shares a lot in common with its non-5G sibling.

title: A close look at the Arm Immortalis-G720 and its 5th Gen graphics
description: Ray tracing, VRS, and much more are found deep down in Arm's 5th-Gen mobile graphics architecture.

title: We asked, you told us: You’re on the wall about buying a Pixel Fold
description: It seems like Google has some work to do to convince you to buy the Pixel Fold.

title: These were the most popular flagship phones in Q1
description: Samsung's Galaxy S23 Ultra beat an iPhone 14 model, while only one foldable made the list.

title: We might see a flagship processor without little cores later this year
description: The Dimensity 9300 is tipped to offer four (!) Cortex-X4 cores and four Cortex-A720 cores, but no little cores.

title: Two more official Pixel Tablet accessories might still be in the pipeline
description: The development of the two Pixel Tablet accessories is reportedly facing delays.
